description: This file defines a class LinearTools that provides methods to interact with the Linear API via GraphQL, including fetching user and team details, managing issues, and querying issues based on various criteria.

classes.name: LinearTools
classes.description: A class that provides methods to interact with the Linear API, including fetching user and team details, creating, updating, and querying issues.

methods.name: _execute_query
methods.description: Helper method to execute GraphQL queries with optional variables, handling HTTP requests and error logging.

methods.name: get_user_details
methods.description: Fetches details of the authenticated user, returning user ID, name, and email.

methods.name: get_teams_details
methods.description: Retrieves the list of teams associated with the authenticated user.

methods.name: get_issue_details
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific issue by its ID.

methods.name: create_issue
methods.description: Creates a new issue in a specified team and project, with optional assignee.

methods.name: update_issue
methods.description: Updates the title or state of an existing issue by its ID.

methods.name: get_user_assigned_issues
methods.description: Retrieves issues assigned to a specific user.

methods.name: get_workflow_issues
methods.description: Retrieves issues within a specific workflow state.
